LanguageData.CAL_BlackSteelTile.label: black steel tile
LanguageData.CAL_BlackSteelTile.description: Strong metal tiles, for a dark and clean look. Pretty, but labor-intensive.
LanguageData.CAL_PlastinTile.label: plastin tile
LanguageData.CAL_PlastinTile.description: Metal tiles, for that spaceship look. Very expensive and requires a lot of work to build.
